txt.en: 'I've been meaning to get me some real armour... just haven't got the money's all.'
'Beautiful weather we're having, ain't it? For the season anyways.'
'Mind ye don't stray into the west hills. Them hills are a lonely place, and they leech the hope right out o' ye.'
'If ye ask me, those Little Folk ought to get out in the sun more. Really, what's the thinking behind living in holes?'
'The constable's been busy as bees in a hive, what with all the strangers coming and going.'
